talk_01:

belongs to me!<sp:5:1:0>

<sp:0:2:2:7d00><snd:TalkPositive_00>Nobody...<sp:5:1:0><sp:0:2:2:6400>


<sp:0:2:2:7d00><snd:Angry_00>gets...<sp:5:1:0><sp:0:2:2:6400>


<sp:0:2:2:7d00><snd:Work_00>a single bite!<sp:5:1:0><sp:0:2:2:6400>


<snd:Angry_01>Ya hear me?


If you want some of your own, head for

talk_06: <sp:3:0:2:0800>Have yourself a merry ol' time, yeah?
talk_02:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>A customer! Welcome to you!


YunoboCo finally finished buildin' the
long-awaited <clr:0000>attraction, Mine-Cart Land<clr:ffff>!

I'm overseeing the maintenance so the
safety's all up to snuff.
talk_03:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>YunoboCo finally finished buildin' the
long-awaited <clr:0000>attraction, Mine-Cart Land<clr:ffff>!

I'm overseein' maintenance, so you can
rest at ease while you ride with glee! The
safety's all up to snuff.
talk_04:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Humming>Anytime 'n' any day, safety is the
only way!
talk_00:
<sp:3:0:2:0900><snd:Think>This <clr:0000>marbled rock roast <clr:ffff>is mine, mine,
all mine!<sp:5:1:0>

If you want some of your own, head for
<clr:0000>Goron City<clr:ffff>. It's up this path.
talk_05:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>If ya wanna check it out, just head on
down this road.

Once ya see the sign that says
"Mine-Cart Land," go just past
it, and then hang a <clr:0000>left<clr:ffff>!
